channel.title: Comments on: I Want to Live!

item.title: By: nathan
item.dc:creator: nathan
item.content:encoded:
A great Paul Coates column, having its fiftieth birthday, about "The Ballad of Barbara Graham," as posted by ace historian Larry Harnisch of Daily Mirror fame.

I especially like how Coates makes note of having enlisted Chuy Reyes to record the "Cahan Decision Cha-Cha" with him; too bad he didn’t have the guts to record more sizzling, out-and-out propaganda.

item.title: By: kim
item.dc:creator: kim
item.description: Just found this MP3 <a href="http://blog.wfmu.org/freeform/2008/06/the-ballad-of-b.html" target="_blank">link</a> on the great WFMU blog. What a jaunty, creepy tune.
item.content:encoded: Just found this MP3 link on the great WFMU blog. What a jaunty, creepy tune.
